title: Non-Custodial
content: We use DLC.Link to lock your BTC as collateral in a non-custodial manner and therefore unleash the full potential of BTC on Stacks.

title: Earn Yield
content: After securely locking your BTC into DLC, we will use a tailor-made lending protocol to generate value & yield for your locked BTC.

title: Permissionless
content: Thanks to DLC.Link, we're able to achieve our goal in a trustless manner way and therefore de-risk your BTC investment.
